Source code for main.forms

from django.forms import ModelForm
from django.forms import inlineformset_factory

from .models import User, Seller, Ad, Picture, SMSLog



[docs]class UserForm(ModelForm):

[docs]    class Meta:
        model = User
        fields = (
            'first_name',
            'last_name',
            'email'
        )




[docs]class SellerForm(ModelForm):

[docs]    class Meta:
        model = Seller
        fields = ('ITN', 'phone')




[docs]class AdForm(ModelForm):

[docs]    class Meta:
        model = Ad
        fields = '__all__'




[docs]class CodeForm(ModelForm):

[docs]    class Meta:
        model = SMSLog
        fields = ('code',)



ImageFormset = inlineformset_factory(
    Ad,
    Picture,
    fields=('image',)
)
